title: Your favorite champion plays The Impossible Quiz. How well do they do?
body:
For those who don't know what it is. Here is a link
http://www.addictinggames.com/puzzle-games/theimpossiblequiz.jsp

{{champion:268}}  gets confused and finds it stupid. He also hates it for lacking shuriman stuff.

replies.body:
{{champion:122}} Has a wonderful time watching others try to solve it.
{{champion:26}} Gives himself extra lives.
{{champion:254}} http://stream1.gifsoup.com/view3/1767326/guy-punching-computer-screen-o.gif
{{champion:429}} Makes someone else do it.
{{champion:421}} HSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS
{{champion:78}} Tries to introduce the computer to hammer diplomacy.
{{champion:119}} Simply stops playing.
{{champion:4}} He cheated, I mean won it.
{{champion:35}}: Somehow beats it in his first try.  Offers to show you the trick, then stabs you in the back.

{{champion:222}} Doesn't get past the first question because her attention span is too short and she doesn't immediately see how guns could be involved.

{{champion:51}}  on the other hand spends many a sleepless stakeout hour trying to beat her own high score.

{{champion:55}} Thinks she is really clever for getting #4, #12, and #17 right on the first try. Concludes that the whole thing is stupid when she gets to #24.

{{champion:16}} Couldn't stop clicking the banana in #18.

{{champion:161}} Lasers Blitzerternet. Buys new computer. Beats it in one try. Did I mention he's omnipotent now?

{{champion:33}} Can't even play the game. Do you realize how hard it is to get a connection in the middle of the dessert?

{{champion:103}} Attempts to charm the game into giving her the answer. Fails miserably. "Why does this work a lot better on Blitz?"

{{champion:238}} Makes his shadow try it until he knows all the answers. Beats it in one try.

{{champion:74}} Loses 50 times due to the highly illogical questions. He only thinks literally. :P

{{champion:41}} Shoots computer "Arrgh! This be the past time of a landlubber!"

{{champion:150}} Beats it in one try. These questions are actually ancient riddles used to prove if one is a genius. Sadly, due to the advancement of society, he is hasn't even reached the average human intelligence. He has a lot to learn.

{{champion:102}} Gets angry and turns into a dragon. Accidentally destroys her house.

{{champion:57}} Trees don't do quizzes bro.

{{champion:31}} Is to big for the keyboard.

{{champion:79}} Beats it in one try while drunk.

{{champion:24}} Draws on a folded sheet of paper so it looks like he beat it on a laptop. "Who needs a real computer?"

{{champion:15}} Spends years searching for the answers in tombs and dungeons around the world. Realizes she could have just looked them up on the Blitzernet. Throws her laptop like a boomerang. Except it never comes back.
{{champion:36}}  Mundo press button where he pleases
{{champion:80}} stabs the computer with his spear challenging it to a fight for making a mockery of him.
{{champion:412}} Would find the maker and make sure there isn't another

{{champion:96}}  He eats it.

{{champion:64}} Sits down at the computer, presses buttons, says duck it and lights himself on fire to prove a point.
{{champion:76}} Tries once, decides the "civilized" world is well and truly doomed.
{{champion:117}} Beats it on her first try, without using skips, or losing a life. Is unable to explain precisely how without making heads implode.
{{champion:90}} Fails, answering every question with void prophecies.
Not my favorites, but, {{champion:50}} and {{champion:74}} win, everyone else loses.
{{champion:35}}  would probably just find a way to stab you. . . in the butt.
OMG  for luk out itz zee CRAZED BUTT STABBERR
{{champion:74}} *"Not enough variables... hmm... not nearly enough variables."*
{{champion:112}} His brain has been replaced by a computer, he downloads a guide telling him all the answers.
{{champion:45}} is already the at final level, since he's the boss of it.

{{champion:126}} Beats it in 5 seconds 
{{champion:74}} Takes 3 hours to take the quiz but comes up with a logical explanation to each question 
{{champion:119}} Cool people don't care about this shit 
{{champion:23}} Would find the person who created this quiz and punch him 
{{champion:79}} Would get wasted and get every question right 
{{champion:222}} Would google every answer 
{{champion:32}} Would lose all three life's on the first question and cry himself to sleep
{{champion:111}}  crushes the mouse trying to start it.

{{champion:83}} and his ghouls try to complete it, but fail when they realize that none of them can read.
{{champion:14}} gets enraged upon his first mistake and smashes the computer.
{{champion:79}} spills his brew on the keyboard and mouse, causing the computer to explode.
{{champion:1}} watches as {{champion:79}}'s computer explodes and laughs.
